TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ComponentCommands extends System.Object
public ref class ComponentCommands abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组与组件相关的标准命令，这些命令具有预定义的按键输入笔势和 属性。

span.span: Provides a standard set of component-related commands, which have predefined key input gestures and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中的命令以及其他命令库类中的命令，例如 和 ，旨在表示应用程序程序员经常遇到的一组常见命令。The commands in the class and commands in the other command library classes, such as and , are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently. 命令仅表示 的实例，而不表示命令的实现逻辑。The commands only represent the instance of the and not the implementation logic for the command. 实现逻辑通过 绑定到命令。The implementation logic is bound to the command via a . 例如，如果在控件（命令目标）上执行 命令，则命令目标可能不会提供执行 命令的逻辑，因此，应用程序编写器将负责编写确定命令目标如何处理命令的逻辑。For example, if the command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic that performs the command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer is responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target handles the command. 但许多控件确实为命令库中的许多命令提供实现逻辑。Many controls do provide implementation logic, though, for many of the commands in the command library. 例如， 类提供 命令的逻辑、 命令、 命令、 命令和 命令。For example, the class provides logic for the command, command, command, command, and command. 有关详细信息，请参阅特定控件类的类文档。See the class documentation for particular control classes for more information. 有关命令和命令的详细信息，请参阅命令[概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview)。For more information on commands and commanding, see [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ExtendSelectionDown As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ ExtendSelectionDown { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“向下扩展选择”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Extend Selection Down command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示向下扩展所选内容的意图。This command indicates the intention to extend the selection downward. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是实际的实现响应命令;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

summary.span: 获取表示“选择到开头”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Select To Home command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示想要扩展从当前项到第一项的选择。This command indicates the intention to extend select the items from the current item to the first item. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是实际的实现响应命令;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SelectToPageDown As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ SelectToPageDown { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“选择下一页”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Select To Page Down command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示从当前项向下选择一页的意图。This command indicates the intention to select from the current item down one page. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是实际的实现响应命令;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SelectToPageUp As RoutedUICommand
public: static property System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ SelectToPageUp { System::Windows::Input::RoutedUICommand ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取表示“选择上一页”命令的值。

span.span: Gets the value that represents the Select To Page Up command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命令指示从当前项向上选择一页的意图。This command indicates the intention to select from the current item up one page. 在任何给定的对象上，都不一定是实际的实现响应命令;在许多情况下，对该命令的响应的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
